itemDisplayName: 2 VMs in VNET - Internal Load Balancer and LB rules for DNS.
description: This template allows you to create 2 Virtual Machines in a VNET and under an internal Load balancer and configure a load balancing rule on TCP/UDP 53 for DNS. This template also deploys a Storage Account, Virtual Network, Public IP address, Availability Set and Network Interfaces.
summary: 2 VMs in VNET - Internal Load Balancer and DNS LB rules
